袁世凱.definition: Yuan Shikai (1859-1916), senior general of late Qing, subsequently warlord and self-proclaimed emperor of China

袁于令.definition: Yuan Yuling (-1674) Qing writer, author of 西樓記|西楼记[Xi1 lou2 Ji4]

袁宏道.definition: Yuan Hongdao (1568-1610), Ming dynasty poet and travel writer

袁州.definition: Yuanzhou district of Yichun city 宜春市, Jiangxi

袁州區.definition: Yuanzhou district of Yichun city 宜春市, Jiangxi

袁枚.definition: Yuan Mei (1716-1798), famous Qing poet and critic, one of Three great poets of the Qianlong era 乾嘉三大家

袁桷.definition: Yuan Jue (1267-1327), Yuan dynasty writer and calligrapher

袁紹.definition: Yuan Shao (153-202), general during late Han, subsequently warlord

袁靜.definition: Yuan Jing (1911-1999), writer, dramatist and film critic

袁頭.definition: silver coin from the early days of the Republic of China (1912-1949) bearing the head of Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4 kai3]
